page.title: 123 Children's Games in Wigan
page.content: "Six Bricks" You have 6 bricks about a foot apart and a person called a flyer has to jump over the bricks as far as she can, then pick a brick and put it where she lands. If you touch a brick or can't jump the spaces, you are out. "Skilly" One team runs off round the streets and the other team has to catch you. Then the people on your team try to skilly you by touching the wall where you are being kept and shouting "Skilly all out" so you are not caught any more. If all your team is caught, the other team goes off and you have to catch them. "Kerby" You have people across the road from each other. You have a try to hit the kerb with a ball for 1 point if it rolls back, 2 if it bounces and you catch it.
